com.robotium.solo
Class Timeout

java.lang.Object
  com.robotium.solo.Timeout

public class Timeout
extends Object

Used to get and set the default timeout lengths of the various Solo methods.

Author:
Renas Reda, renas.reda@robotium.com

Constructor Detail

Timeout

public Timeout()
Method Detail

setLargeTimeout

public static void setLargeTimeout(int milliseconds)
Sets the default timeout length of the waitFor methods. Will fall back to the default values set by Solo.Config.

Timeout can also be set through adb shell (requires root access):

'adb shell setprop solo_large_timeout milliseconds'

Parameters:
milliseconds - the default timeout length of the waitFor methods

setSmallTimeout

public static void setSmallTimeout(int milliseconds)
Sets the default timeout length of the get, is, set, assert, enter, type and click methods. Will fall back to the default values set by Solo.Config.

Timeout can also be set through adb shell (requires root access):

'adb shell setprop solo_small_timeout milliseconds'

Parameters:
milliseconds - the default timeout length of the get, is, set, assert, enter and click methods

getLargeTimeout

public static int getLargeTimeout()
Gets the default timeout length of the waitFor methods.

Returns:
the timeout length in milliseconds

getSmallTimeout

public static int getSmallTimeout()
Gets the default timeout length of the get, is, set, assert, enter, type and click methods.

Returns:
the timeout length in milliseconds
